General.Name: Jetbest
General.Description: Jetbest Corporation researches and develops, manufactures, and sells inkjet printing products in Taiwan. The company offers various inks, such as UV inks; wide format inks, including eco solvent pigments, mild solvent pigments, water dyes and pigments, and oil-based dyes and pigments; textile inks comprising dye sublimation and disperse, resin pigments, and reactive dyes; magic inks; desktop inks; pigment mill base; and bulk systems consisting of refilled cartridges. The company also distributes its products approximately in 80 countries. Jetbest Corporation was founded in 2004 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 173-2, Dahu Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30093
